MultiState.name: MultiState / MultiItem display of a group of values in one widget
MultiState.author: Michael Martens
MultiState.description: V1 - Nov 2017 - Items of a group are shown, depending on config they are just displayed or can be changed.

settings.label: Header of table
settings.description: Enter a header, if needed

settings.label: GroupID
settings.description: Enter the group to visualize

settings.label: Iconset and Icon to be displayed
settings.description: What icon shall be used (e.g.: freepik-household, light-bulb-1); If empty, these icons are used

settings.label: Type of items to display
settings.description: Enter here the type of switch to allow proper selection; Showvalues_O.. showing green for the selected value

settings.label: Skip first n chars in description
settings.description: if all labels start with "EG.." you can skip them by entering a number of chars

settings.label: Show summary of states
settings.description: Check if you want to see how many items are in the "on" state

settings.label: Offer general switch for all items
settings.description: Check here to switch all items at once (No for Windows usefull)

settings.label: Additional value
settings.description: If a second value shall be displayed as a reference, the name variable must be identical plus the value. E.g. Temp1 and Temp1_soll by naming "_soll"

settings.label: Unit
settings.description: If a unit shall be displayed, enter it here. E.g. "_°C" - with a leading underscore (converted to blanks) to create a distance
